chunk:
Farmacy Clear Bloom (2018 formulation)

Brand: Farmacy

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Tridecyl Stearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Peg-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/Hexacaprate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polyglyceryl-6 Isostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil,

Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Echinacea Purpurea Root Extract, Jojoba Esters, Squalane.

Directions: Pour a small amount into palm and blend with a few drops of water until a silky milk forms. Massage onto skin with upward and outward motions. Rinse with w

otions. Rinse with warm water and pat dry.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
